member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_REFERENCE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTOR_H264
member.summary: Represents a reference picture descriptor for H.264 video encoding.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_REFERENCE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTOR_H264.ReconstructedPictureResourceIndex
member.summary: Maps the current reference picture described by this structure to a resource in the array.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_REFERENCE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTOR_H264.IsLongTermReference
member.summary: Set when the described reference frame is being used as a long-term reference picture.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_REFERENCE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTOR_H264.LongTermPictureIdx
member.summary: If used as a long term reference, indicates the long-term reference index number.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_REFERENCE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTOR_H264.PictureOrderCountNumber
member.summary: The described reference frame display order.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_REFERENCE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTOR_H264.FrameDecodingOrderNumber
member.summary: The frame decode order with semantic as indicated by the slice header frame_num syntax element associated with the encoded reference picture.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_REFERENCE_PICTURE_DESCRIPTOR_H264.TemporalLayerIndex
member.summary: Picture layer number in temporal hierarchy. Please check for maximum number of layers in .
